MechWorkModeDef.label: defend yourself
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoid, regardless of type, will attack enemies that get too close.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> None <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No

MechWorkModeDef.label: find and destroy
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, regardless of their type, will look for enemies and try to destroy them.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: wait enemy
MechWorkModeDef.description:
The mechanoid will shutdown and wait for the enemy, and when it appears, it will wake up and head towards the target.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> Waiting spot <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No

MechWorkModeDef.label: work and wait
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, depending on the type, will work, and when an enemy appears, they will drop everything and go to destroy him. If they don't have a job, they'll just shutdown.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Universal <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> Waiting spot <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: ambush
MechWorkModeDef.description:
The mechanoid shutdown and waits for the enemy to approach it, then attacks.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> Ambush spot <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No

MechWorkModeDef.label: work and recharge
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Work autonomously according to mechanoid type. If the mechanoid cannot work or it has done all the work it shutdown.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Work <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> Worker spot <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: work if safe
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids will work, but only as long as there are no enemies on the map. In case of danger, they will try to get to the <color=#f5ffa2>safe spot</color>.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Work <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> Safe spot <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: work, recharge and escort
MechWorkModeDef.description:
The mechanoid will accompany the overseer if it does not have a job, and will also be charged if necessary.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Universal <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No

MechWorkModeDef.label: escort if enemy
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, regardless of type, will accompany the overseer, but only if there is an enemy on the map. When there is no enemy, mechanoids shutdown.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> Waiting spot <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: escort and recharge
MechWorkModeDef.description:
The mechanoid, regardless of its type, will accompany the overseer and, if necessary, go to charge.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown spot:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No
